# tcdsb

The goal of `tcdsb` is to provide report templates and ggplot themes
that align with the visual identity of the Toronto Catholic District
School Board (TCDSB).

## Installation

You can install the development version of tcdsb from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("grousell/tcdsb")
```

## Plot Example

Here is a basic plot:

``` r
library(tidyverse)
library(tcdsb)

mtcars |> 
  head(3) |> 
  rownames_to_column("car") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = car, y = disp)) +
  geom_col() + 
  labs(title = "Title of Plot", 
       subtitle = "Subtitle", 
       x = NULL, 
       y = "Displacement") 
```

![](reference/figures/README-basic_plot-1.png)

The `tcdsb_colours_fonts` function loads the appropriate fonts and HEX
colours.

``` r
tcdsb_colours_fonts()
```

![](images/tcdsb_colour_font_pic.png)

By adding `tcdsb_ggplot_theme` at the end of the code to build the plot,
a consistent theme is applied.

``` r

mtcars |> 
  head(3) |> 
  rownames_to_column("car") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = car, y = disp)) +
  geom_col() + 
  labs(title = "Title of Plot", 
       subtitle = "Subtitle", 
       x = NULL, 
       y = "Displacement") + 
  tcdsb::tcdsb_ggplot_theme()
```

![](reference/figures/README-themed_plot-1.png)

Custom colours can be added to the chart using `tcdsb_board_color`.

``` r

mtcars |> 
  head(3) |> 
  rownames_to_column("car") |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = car, y = disp)) +
  geom_col(fill = tcdsb_board_color) + 
  labs(title = "Title of Plot", 
       subtitle = "Subtitle", 
       x = NULL, 
       y = "Displacement") + 
  tcdsb::tcdsb_ggplot_theme()
```

![](reference/figures/README-themed_plot2-1.png)

## Project Setup Example

``` r

# tcdsb::tcdsb_project_setup()
```

Creates a README file and folders for reference documents, R scripts,
assets (i.e.Â image files), raw and clean data.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`tcdsb_colours_fonts()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_colours_fonts.md)
  : TCDSB Colors and Fonts
- [`tcdsb_diverge_plot_function()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_diverge_plot_function.md)
  : TCDSB Diverging Plots A function that creates a diverging bar chart,
  using 2, 4 or 6 factor levels.
- [`tcdsb_diverge_plot_other_function()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_diverge_plot_other_function.md)
  : TCDSB Diverging Plots - Other A function to create plots of other
  responses (i.e. Missing, Neutral) to pair with TCDSB Diverging Plots
- [`tcdsb_ggplot_theme()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_ggplot_theme.md)
  : TCDSB ggplot Theme
- [`tcdsb_gt_table()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_gt_table.md)
  : TCDSB gt tables
- [`tcdsb_project_setup()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_project_setup.md)
  : TCDSB Project Setup A function that sets up a project folder.
  Creates a README file subfolders.
- [`tcdsb_report_template_pdf()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_report_template_pdf.md)
  : Report Template - PDF A function that downloads an .Rmd template,
  images and .tex files for a TCDSB themed report template.
- [`tcdsb_report_template_quarto()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_report_template_quarto.md)
  : Report Template - Quarto PDF A function that downloads an .qmd
  template and associate .typ and .lua files for a TCDSB themed report
  template.
- [`tcdsb_report_template_word()`](https://grousell.github.io/tcdsb/reference/tcdsb_report_template_word.md)
  : Report Template - Word A function that downloads an .Rmd template,
  .R script and Word templates for a TCDSB themed report template.
